name: Jurassic Run - The Dinosaur Racing Simulator Game
name_original: Jurassic Run - The Dinosaur Racing Simulator Game
description:
◉◉ Jurassic Run ◉◉

◉◉ The Free Dinosaur Games Animal Racing Simulator 4 Kids ◉◉

Escape with the T-Rex in an apocalyptic environment to save the dinosaurs of destruction! The Jurassic cannot extinguish!

Choose between the four available T-Rex dinosaurs and experiment the speed, the strength and the control of each one with the mission to bring them as far as possible. Keep the dinosaur safe!

There are constantly more meteorites falling that put the dinos life in danger!

They all try to escape desperately but if you shock with another you’ll stay behind and might not survive!

Complete missions to be doing your most feared dinosaur Jurassic. Collect a lot of points to try to achieve the best position in the world ranking!

Scroll through the route comfortably thanks to the easy controls that the game offers. Feel the speed of the dinosaur on your phone!

This is a dinosaur game adapted to all ages, but the children will enjoy it in a very special way.

They’ll laugh and enjoy while they learn how life was like in the Jurassic and how difficult it was to survive!

Jurassic Run features:

◉ Jurassic environment!
◉ Realistic T-Rex!
◉ Amazing graphics!
◉ Adapted to all ages!
◉ Worldwide leaderboards!
◉ Easy commands!
◉ Thematic Music!
◉ Free!

If the dinosaurs are your passion and you’ll like to control the fierce T-Rex, don’t miss out this amazing wild animal’s game!

We like to receive feedbacks from our players and know if the game matched their expectations. Please let us know your comments, ratings and suggestions! We try to answer to all the comments!

Show the world that the meteorites cannot stop your dinosaur and that you’re perfectly familiar with the Jurassic!
